The Onlife Manifesto
Introduction

Commentary on the Onlife Manifesto
Dualism is Dead. Long Live Plurality (Instead of Duality)

Towards a Grey Ecology

On Tolerance and Fictitious Publics
The Onlife Initiative—Conclusion
